name: Catalog project
tagline: Project 3 for Udacity Full Stack Web Dev Nanodegree
body:
# catalog_project Project 3 for Udacity Full Stack Web Dev Nanodegree Requirement ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- python 2.x
SQLite
Python Modules:
flask
sqlalchemy
oauth2client
How to Run Project ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- After downloading the project, locate file start_app.py
1) run start_app.py
2) using a web browser and go to address localhost:5000
Note: to modify the database, user needs a Google+ account

Extra Credit Description ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- API Endpoints - implemented Atom
CRUD: Read - implemented image field
CRUD: Create - implemented image field
CRUD: Update - implemented image field
CRUD: Read - implemented image field
CRUD: Delete - implemented anti-CSRF token to prevent attack
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
